languages.text: "Раньше, до того нашего разговора, я бы тоже расценил это как преступление. Но теперь, когда Простор пылает, а на Летусе мы увидели все оттенки абсурда, я так не думаю".
"Before that conversation we had, I would have considered it a crime myself. But with the Expanse burning, and after witnessing every shade of absurdity on Leethus, my opinion has changed."
languages.original_text: "Раньше, до того нашего разговора, я бы тоже расценил это как преступление. Но теперь, когда Простор пылает, а на Летусе мы увидели все оттенки абсурда, я так не думаю".

traits.locale_text: "Before that conversation we had, I would have considered it a crime myself. But with the Expanse burning, and after witnessing every shade of absurdity on Leethus, my opinion has changed."
"Before that conversation we had, I would have considered it a crime myself. But with the Expanse burning, and after witnessing every shade of absurdity on Leethus, my opinion has changed."
"Before that conversation we had, I would have considered it a crime myself. But with the Expanse burning, and after witnessing every shade of absurdity on Leethus, my opinion has changed."

"Before that conversation we had, I would have considered it a crime myself. But with the Expanse burning, and after witnessing every shade of absurdity on Leethus, my opinion has changed."
"Before that conversation we had, I would have considered it a crime myself. But with the Expanse burning, and after witnessing every shade of absurdity on Leethus, my opinion has changed."

languages.text: «Antes de nuestra conversación, yo también lo habría considerado un crimen, pero, con la Extensión en llamas y tras haber sido testigo de las absurdidades infinitas de Leethus, he cambiado de opinión».
languages.original_text: "Before that conversation we had, I would have considered it a crime myself. But with the Expanse burning, and after witnessing every shade of absurdity on Leethus, my opinion has changed."

traits.locale_text: «Antes de nuestra conversación, yo también lo habría considerado un crimen, pero, con la Extensión en llamas y tras haber sido testigo de las absurdidades infinitas de Leethus, he cambiado de opinión».

languages.text: “如果我们当初没有进行过那场谈话，那我现在恐怕依然会认为这属于犯罪行为。然而，整个科罗努斯扩区熊熊燃烧，我亲眼目睹了利瑟斯上无数荒诞的事情，我的观念也改变了。”
languages.original_text: "Before that conversation we had, I would have considered it a crime myself. But with the Expanse burning, and after witnessing every shade of absurdity on Leethus, my opinion has changed."

traits.locale_text: “如果我们当初没有进行过那场谈话，那我现在恐怕依然会认为这属于犯罪行为。然而，整个科罗努斯扩区熊熊燃烧，我亲眼目睹了利瑟斯上无数荒诞的事情，我的观念也改变了。”

languages.text: 「その会話の前であれば、私自身もそれを罪だと考えたでしょう。しかし、エキスパンスが燃え、リーザスに関するありとあらゆる馬鹿げたことを目撃した後、私の考えは変わりました」
languages.original_text: "Before that conversation we had, I would have considered it a crime myself. But with the Expanse burning, and after witnessing every shade of absurdity on Leethus, my opinion has changed."

traits.locale_text: 「その会話の前であれば、私自身もそれを罪だと考えたでしょう。しかし、エキスパンスが燃え、リーザスに関するありとあらゆる馬鹿げたことを目撃した後、私の考えは変わりました」

languages.text: "Vor unserer Unterhaltung hätte ich das selbst als Verbrechen betrachtet. Aber nun, da die Ausdehnung brennt und ich auf Leethus allerlei Absurditäten erleben durfte, habe ich meine Meinung geändert."
languages.original_text: "Before that conversation we had, I would have considered it a crime myself. But with the Expanse burning, and after witnessing every shade of absurdity on Leethus, my opinion has changed."

traits.locale_text: "Vor unserer Unterhaltung hätte ich das selbst als Verbrechen betrachtet. Aber nun, da die Ausdehnung brennt und ich auf Leethus allerlei Absurditäten erleben durfte, habe ich meine Meinung geändert."

languages.text: « Avant notre petite conversation, j'y aurais vu un crime impardonnable. Mais avec la crise qui sévit dans les Étendues, et après avoir été le témoin de toutes les nuances d'absurdité sur Leethus, force m'est de revoir ma copie. »
languages.original_text: "Before that conversation we had, I would have considered it a crime myself. But with the Expanse burning, and after witnessing every shade of absurdity on Leethus, my opinion has changed."

traits.locale_text: « Avant notre petite conversation, j'y aurais vu un crime impardonnable. Mais avec la crise qui sévit dans les Étendues, et après avoir été le témoin de toutes les nuances d'absurdité sur Leethus, force m'est de revoir ma copie. »

languages.text: "Yaptığımız konuşma öncesinde ben de bunu suç olarak nitelendirirdim. Ancak Enginlik'teki yangından ve Leethus'ta saçmalığın her tonuna tanık olduktan sonra fikrim değişti."
languages.original_text: "Before that conversation we had, I would have considered it a crime myself. But with the Expanse burning, and after witnessing every shade of absurdity on Leethus, my opinion has changed."

traits.locale_text: "Yaptığımız konuşma öncesinde ben de bunu suç olarak nitelendirirdim. Ancak Enginlik'teki yangından ve Leethus'ta saçmalığın her tonuna tanık olduktan sonra fikrim değişti."
